law.catch_line: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Aggrieved party" means:
a property owner whose property:
adjoins, fronts, or is located near the subject property; or
is located within sight or sound of the subject property; or
an individual located within the same subdivision as the subject property or who lives up to three-quarters of a mile by road or otherwise one-half mile away from the subject property.

section.section:
"Applicant" means a person that is:
a title owner or contract purchaser of land that is the subject of an application;
a trustee who has an interest in land that is the subject of an application, excluding trustees described in a mortgage or deed of trust; or
a holder of at least a 10% interest in land that is the subject of an application.
"Applicant" includes a person that is an officer or director of a corporation that actually holds title to the land or is a contract purchaser of the land that is the subject of an application.

text.section: "Board" means the Board of County Commissioners for Frederick County.
"Board member" includes an individual elected or appointed to the Board or a candidate who takes the oath of office for the Board.
"Candidate" means a candidate for the Board who becomes a member of the Board.

"Contribution" means a payment or transfer of money or property worth at least $100, calculated cumulatively during the pendency of the application, to a candidate or a treasurer or political committee of a candidate.
"Partnership" includes a general partnership, a limited liability partnership, a limited partnership, a limited liability limited partnership, or a joint venture.
"Party of record" means a person that participated in a proceeding on an application before the Board by appearing at a public hearing or filing a statement in an official record.

"Pendency of the application" means any time between the acceptance by the County Department of Planning and Zoning of a filing of an application and the earlier of:
2 years; or
the expiration of 30 days after:
the Board has taken final action on the application; or
the application is withdrawn.
"Political committee" means a committee specifically created to promote the candidacy of a Board member who is running for an elective office.
"Treasurer" has the meaning stated in § 1-101 of the Election Law Article.
